title: Packaging, "100 Watt Soft White Light Bulbs", ca. 1968
inscribed: Recto: imprinted in red ink, upper left quadrant: 100, imprinted in blue ink upper right corner: soft/white/bulbs; imprinted in red, upper right quadrant: 7JA192-100/ Made in USA; imprinted in blue, right of center: soft/white/light/bulbs; imprinted in red, lower left quadrant: 100; lower right corner: watt; verso: imprinted in red ink, upper left corner: 100/ 1690 initial lumens/ Rated average life 750 hours; imprinted in blue upper right corner: soft/white/bulbs; imprinted in upper right quadrant: 2 for 60¢/ plus/ tax. Imprinted in blue, right of center: soft/white/light/ bulbs; imprinted in red, lower left quadrant: 100; lower right corner: watt.
description: Package in white, red, and blue with wattage, image of light bulb, and Westinghouse logo.

tombstone.epitaph:
Packaging, "100 Watt Soft White Light Bulbs", ca. 1968.
ca. 1968. Offset lithograph on white cardboard. Gift of Marion S. Rand. 2002-11-42.
